mapper.sql: apc.id as apc_id, apc.product_id as apc_product_id, apc.position_type as apc_position_type, apc.position_name as apc_position_name, apc.copywriting1 as apc_copywriting1, apc.copywriting2 as apc_copywriting2, apc.copywriting3 as apc_copywriting3, apc.color as apc_color, apc.add_time as apc_add_time, apc.modify_time as apc_modify_time, apc.add_operator_id as apc_add_operator_id, apc.modify_operator_id as apc_modify_operator_id, apc.is_delete as apc_is_delete
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from yy_copywriting_config apc
order by ${orderByClause}
